department.ch: 學務處-服務學習發展中心

remark.ch: 1.此為選課用時段，實際上課時間將由課程助教另行通知。2.本課程不開放外系選修。

goal.en: The goal of this course is to help students understand the concept of service learning through meaningful community service activities, experience the meaning of service from service learning, deepen the field of learning, expand their life scope and life experience.
goal.ch: 本課程目標乃是協助學生透過有意義之社區服務活動，認識服務學習理念，從服務學習中體驗服務的意義，深化學習的領域、擴大自己的生活範 疇與生命歷練。

content.en:
(1) Select volunteer service
(2) Choose a service organization
(3) Class discussion and reflection
content.ch:
(一)選取志願服務相關主題於課堂上講述
(二)選擇服務機構前往服務
(三)課堂討論與反思

method.en: Lecture Seminar Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction
method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗 個別指導

grading.ch: 出席率(20%)、服務態度(20%)、即反思報告成績 (60%)
